Question: In 1988 he founded this person Systems Corporation, Inc.
Hints: By the time this person graduated in 1953 he was president of his class and battalion commander.
This person's running mate was retired Vice Admiral James Stockdale, a highly-decorated former Vietnam prisoner of war (POW).
In 1984 this person bought a very early copy of Magna Carta, one of only a few to leave the United Kingdom.
